author: MilanoBicocca-pix
body:
#### PR description:
Implementing few updates to the BeamSpotOnline to fix some bugs spotted during last MWGR.
In `BeamMonitor/FakeBeamMonitor`:
- Improved the information logged to condDB
- Set meaningful exit codes in case of errors

In the beasmpot clients:
- Made the BeamSpotOnline tag and jobName options configurable so that they are automatically set when running in the playback system
- Removed the `noDB` option and aligned the `beam_` and `beamhlt_` clients to the fake clients
- Implemented `omsServiceUrl` in all clients
- In `beam_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py` the parameter `DBParameters.authenticationPath` from the GT module was set to an empty string (`''`) and was conflicting with the same parameter in the OnlineDBOutputService module (set to `'.'`). Now they are both set to `'.'` so there should not be any conflict.

#### PR validation:
Some of these updates were already successfully tested during last MWGR (e.g. tag/jobName in playback). The others have been tested running the unitTest on lxplus.

#### Backport
